sentence: A campaign staffer for former NFL star Herschel Walker, who is running as a Republican for a Senate seat in Georgia, posted a photo with Clarence Thomas on Friday afternoon marking the first time Thomas has been seen since being released from a hospital on March 25 following an undisclosed illness.
author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Clarence Thomas publicly spotted for first time since being hospitalized

sentence: Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas met with Senate candidate Herschel Walker in his first quasi-public appearance since he was discharged from the hospital last month.
author: Kaelan Deese
title: Justice Clarence Thomas meets with Georgia GOP Senate hopeful Herschel Walker

sentence: Remarking on a photo of Herschel Walker and Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas, Democratic Rep. Mondaire Jones of New York asked whether Thomas will recuse himself from any cases that emerge from the Peach State's 2022 Senate election contest.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: 'I think the court has crossed the rubicon': Sen. Chris Murphy sounds alarm over photo of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas with US Senate candidate Herschel Walker
Democrats Raise Red Flags Over That Photo Op Of Herschel Walker (R) & Clarence Thomas

author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Clarence Thomas is the only Supreme Court justice to take a photo with a political candidate in history: MSNBC host

sentence: I didnt choose a top picture for this commentary of Herschel Walker, Tim Scott, Clarence Thomas, or any of the other current quislings of color supported by the right, because even looking at them makes me bilious.
title: Black Kos, Tuesdays Chile: All my skinfolk aint my kinfolk We see you Thomas, Scott, and Walker.

sentence: He gave these reasons: Thomas posed with Herschel Walker, a Republican candidate trying to run against Democrat Senator Raphael Warnock.
title: Clarence Thomas is a politician, says Lawrence O'Donnell last night

sentence: Thomas appeared to be in good spirits earlier this month when he met Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker in his first quasipublic appearance since leaving the hospital.
author: Kaelan Deese
title: Clarence Thomas resumes hearing oral arguments after absence from Supreme Court

sentence: Consider Herschel Walker, a pro-liberty former football star endorsed by former President Donald Trump for his Senate run in Georgia.

title: This Black History Month, Let's Honor the Past and Present Champions of Faith and Freedom
